name: billyamericana
text: A comment left by billyamericana was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jstegall, sevenarts, sumomo, fancypants, atticusonline, BillyLK, CanusDivinus, PEZ, nutmeg, blarghamagarky, wehavemagnums)

name: zem
text: Didn't you read the alt text? "Not that he will kill them, but they will die there."

name: epicurus
text: I think the "2 or 3" refers to the number of air holes.

name: pitseleh
text: I thought it referred to how many children he could fit in there to die. Because I think he could probably fit three children in there, but if one is a bit of a chunkity-ass, then only two.

name: apricotta
text: Was Nice Pete inspired by these hands?

name: saint
text: You mean THESE KNIVES?!

name: soticoto
text: No.

name: dybrar
text: If your dying children are able to utter anything more than low, pitiful gasps, forced painfully from parched throats, you're really not doing it right.

name: catachresis
text: I think the system has problems but also that you are reading a little too much into some strangers pressing a button on their mouse when their mouse is in a given position

text: A comment left by jollysaintpete was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Mangtastic, atticusonline, Njury, wingspan)

name: boredom_man
text: Consider my chubby a Lame of Love.

name: stoned_lightning
text: I think some of those lames might have come because you wrote this.

name: mjfitzge
text:
so you are saying that some of the first post lames he is referring to in his second post were due to the fact that at that moment he was writing that second post?

you just blew my mind...

name: achilleselbow
text: A comment left by achilleselbow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by orvel, DougTheHead, atticusonline, Cane_5, BrianNotBrian)

name: scraggg
text: Laaaaaaaame.

name: saint
text:
The sounds like I something I used to say, but you might have managed a little more condescension than I.

This should worry you, sir.

name: soticoto
text: The irony of your last sentence here amuses me.

name: anzio
text: Yeah, because sarcasm is so easy to understand through text.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Nice Pete has the box, and he does not know when it will happen or why, but the children will die there.

name: nutmeg
text: if i were a man of money, i would get myself a print of this

name: soilentshuggah
text: Second and fifth panel crack me up every-damn-time.

name: 60teeth
text: Buc Bucket

name: anitrophaeron
text: I wonder how many government watch lists you could get put on if you had a t-shirt of the last panel?

name: spicyponyhead
text: I'm tempted to make myself one. I think it would be even creepier, stretched across my tits.

name: soticoto
text: That mental image gets a chubby from me... literally.

name: spinynorman
text: Pete's head is always slightly forward and cocked to one side. It doesn't sit right on his shoulders, and then he puts his hands on his hips. This is the classic Appalachain hillby posture of standin' and lookin' at something and givin' it a thunk.

name: aplomb
text: Whenever I think of Peter H. Cropes I imagine his head unconsciously drifting around on his neck like a screensaver icon. Someday I will make an animated GIF of it.

name: jalapenoenema
text: The question is whether he is drawing from life or imagination.

name: c_dizzle
text: I'm going to guess from imagination. It's nice to guess. I'd like to know WHERE the context of the second frame fits in]. Is Pete watching over Téodore from an unknown locale, or was it just to remind us of who Pete is? ....I doubt it was the latter.

name: oplem
text: Ever see a Kubrick film where the camera cuts quickly to a silent shot of a person? That's what I'm thinking.

name: eatmorekix
text: he will not kill them. he will lock them in a box and leave them in a field. until they die.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Thanksgiving Break Blogs (Thursday - Sunday)

Roast Beef: Kraftwerk Thanksgiving

Today's Blogs

Teodor: Stupid Todd and his death wish
Philippe: The baby made me go to sleep!
Nice Pete: My new novel is released.

"What's this about, mustache-dick? Your partner here put his dick across your upper lip like a mustache? Is that why you're buggin' me? I already have a mustache, so NO THANKS on the lip pedro thing."

name: biznart
text: Lyle is a wordsmith.

name: xiaomimi
text: That quote there is probably the thing that made me laugh the hardest in any of the blogs so far.

name: numberkillinger
text: the blogs today they are most fine

name: killingthejay
text: i wonder why pete draws human hands instead of cat paws

name: orvel
text:
1) Cut three holes in the box.
2) Stick some kids in that box.
3) Never open the box.

name: echidnaboy
text:
Dave was a lost cause, a real psycho
Spent half his time wishing he was a man
Rather than being a man

To educate his own will, he puts people in boxes
Head first, then legs, then something else

name: apocowarg
text: Oh fuck and the yes, Mclusky. I caught them on their final tour when they came through Boston. It is hands-down my favorite concert memory.

name: ham_shoes
text:
Why is Nice Pete depicted in panel 2

Is he secretly standing behind Teodor, watching?

LOOK OUT TEODOR

name: aamzed
text: Nice Pete is Dangerous-sexy.

name: mantasmicdude
text: This strip is in my top ten.
